casebody.data:
Nos. 1822 and 1823. No. 1896. Central Machete Sugar Company, Appellant, v. Richardson and Hill, Substituted by Benedicto, Acting Treasurer, Appellee. American Railroad Company, Appellant, v. Benedicto, Treasurer, Appellee. January 23, 1919.

January 23, 1919.

San Juan, Section 1.

Recovery of taxes paid under protest. San Juan, Section 1.

Reversed.
